## Replicate Data Pull

## QC Analysis

```{r warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

f <- datapoints(f, 1:2)
q <- datapoints(q, 1:2)
dc <- compare_datapoints(f, q)

```

`r present_qc_match_report(dc, "QC Match")`

# NOTES
